name: Good Dogs!
description:
This was a short game made for the Trijam #189 Gamejam. The Trijam challenges creators to make a game in only 3 hours! Sadly I exceeded this time limit, hitting the 4 hour mark :( The theme was 'Push and Pull', and in Good Dogs you have to Push and Pull your hand across dogs to pet them!

Controls:

Left Click -> Pet Upwards (Push)
Right Click -> Pet Downward (Pull)

Pet all the dogs that meet the description by petting up>down>up>down>up>down... and so on until they're happy!
